title: Azure PowerShell Automation Guidelines
body: For Azure PowerShell automation: Always use Connect-AzAccount with appropriate context, implement proper subscription selection with Set-AzContext, use resource groups consistently, implement retry logic for transient failures, validate Azure resource existence before operations, use Azure resource tagging for governance, and implement proper logging for audit trails.
